com.mingweisamuel.zyra.util

Interface RateLimit

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TokenRateLimit

    public interface RateLimit

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<TemporalBucket> getBuckets()
      Get the rate limit's buckets.
      static long getOrDelay(RateLimit... rateLimits)
      Ensures that all provided rateLimits can be obeyed, or returns an estimated delay in milliseconds to wait.
      void onResponse(org.asynchttpclient.Response response)
      Callback for when a response returns.
      long retryAfterDelay()
      Get delay needed to respect retry-after headers.

    • Method Detail

      • retryAfterDelay

        long retryAfterDelay()
        Get delay needed to respect retry-after headers.
        Returns:
        Milliseconds to delay or -1 if none needed. Zero may be returned and more delay less than one millisecond is required.

      • getBuckets

        List<TemporalBucket> getBuckets()
        Get the rate limit's buckets.
        Returns:
        Current buckets.

      • onResponse

        void onResponse(org.asynchttpclient.Response response)
        Callback for when a response returns.
        Parameters:
        response - Response that applies to this RateLimit.

      • getOrDelay

        static long getOrDelay(RateLimit... rateLimits)
        Ensures that all provided rateLimits can be obeyed, or returns an estimated delay in milliseconds to wait.
        Parameters:
        rateLimits - Rate limits to obey.
        Returns:
        -1 if success, or a non-negative time to delay in milliseconds.
